content.title: Body of man killed in Rarotonga scooter crash to be brought home - Independent Community Newspaper
content.desc: Body of Michael Kemp, who died in Cook Islands, to be flown home to his family this weekend.

content.title: Aucklander dies in Rarotonga after incident on scooter while on holiday - New Zealand Herald
content.desc: An Auckland man has died in a scooter crash in Rarotonga. Michael Kemp, originally from Northland, died on Sunday following a scooter accident on the island.

content.title: Auckland man killed in scooter crash in Rarotonga - Independent Community Newspaper
content.desc: A "fun loving, positive" man has died in a scooter crash in the Cook Islands.
